title: Social Experiment
body:
Will a picture of a pickle be upvoted, downvoted, or ignored?

https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2015-03/31/1/enhanced/webdr02/enhanced-7879-1427781273-1.jpg

replies.body: {{champion:107}} _downvotes furiously_
http://i.imgur.com/saVfOt7.gif"
http://i1210.photobucket.com/albums/cc407/wowzamora/CRY-SOME-MOAR-LITTLE-BABY.jpg
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/the-incredibles/images/5/57/UFgmH1a.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150818073512
Gnar?!?

{{http://i.imgur.com/7g8TCH3.jpg}}

EDIT: I give up. I can't get it to load right. XD
https://media.giphy.com/media/U7uPH9yPznVJu/giphy.gif
pickle deserves upvote. poll deserves downvote. where is the "Pickles are the best" option
This is a non-partipickle poll. Completely unbiased.
to be unbiased it would pretty much require a "pickles are best option" since every option is basically saying "no i dont like pickles" -_-

Oh trust me it is unbiased. Pickles are the devil.

http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/devil-cucumber-pickle-vector-style-illustrated-vector-format-available-51499633.jpg
I relish the idea!
You seem to dilliver on pickle puns
I'm a simple man, I see a pickle, I upvote.
I'm a salty woman, I see a pickle, I downvote.
Well I'm a sour gay, I see a pickle, I upvote, from 2 reasons.
http://i.imgur.com/n8xyir0.gif?1"

Well I'm an adorable lesbian, I see a pickle I upvote

Wait... I just understood the "It looks like.." reference 
Crap, now I must downvote :(

It was fine while it was still a pickle gorramit!
This is biased. Put it in Miscellaneous next time for a slightly more useful sample  =P
Pickles and I never got along as children... Angelica was a jerk and Tommy was entitled.

> [{quoted}](name=Fritterz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dx04Thk7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T17:35:44.659+0000)
>
> Pickles and I never got along as children... Angelica was a jerk and Tommy was entitled.

What about Cynthia?
Don't get me started on Cynthia... She was so fake.
ALL HAIL THE PICKLE!!!!!
{{champion:32}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:154}}  =  pickles
Your missing the option "Nerf Zed" in the poll.

I upvoted it, then I downvoted, then I upvoted for a second time.  Here, let me illustrate in gif form.

http://i.imgur.com/BYrw2ua.gif?Noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/cUBq3xt.gif?Noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/BYrw2ua.gif?Noredirect
http://i.imgur.com/Z8vuvyg.gif"
I didn't even know that I didn't like pickles until this post told me so.
Apparently, no one actually likes pickles. We simply trick ourselves into believing we do.
Sounds reasonable.
Zac please stop taking dick pics and posting them on the boards, this is a PG-13 site
This may be the best topic I've seen all year

So, was this post ignored? Absolutely not, better than reposts aniway. Plus M&G is already a time sink, so at this point better go full steam and dive into it.

Will it be upvoted? honestly, these days i am upvoting everuthing that is not dinamic Q complaints or salt in general. Gettin real tired of dat shit.

The poll? I wanted to try to guess the least voted choice and guess what? I did it! I am the fucking pro diamond rank of polls, bitches! 
AND SO FAR I AM EVEN THE ONLY ONE GET ON MA LEVEL!
i dont believe in pickles. if anyone has proof i would be happy to see it
I cant find "Yes" pls send help{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I thought maybe Riven got Zac excited again.

Let it be Laughing Fish or MM and they can get an upvote for even just putting a simple "t."
I wouldn't try social experiments here. It gets completely one sided. Game play takes up the most and every one who tries to put a meme in the memes and games section that isnt those two i said gets down voted for not being them.

Just stating observation

Not an official experiment if you state what the outcomes are :p
Indirectly influences your audience
We need more meaningful posts like this.
Puck Fickles.
used to hate pickes in my McDonald's burgers, now I like them alot.

https://youtu.be/pm25hDxbXHI at 1:20
couldn't find a gif
I know who like this thread mister pickles! GOOD BOY!!!
I'm cucumber and I find this offensive.
I WAS A CUCUMBER ONCE!
KEEP THE PICKLE ALIVE!!!!
Nice upvote farm
It seems more on the cucumber side of the pickle spectrum
